document.id: City of American Canyon, Cal., Ord. No. 99-06
document.heading: AN ORDINANCE OF THE CITY OF AMERICAN CANYON REPEALING ORDINANCE NO. 99-02 REGARDING PREZONING OF THE "HORSESHOE" PROPERTY SURROUNDING THE TOWN CENTER SITE, SHOWN AS "TC-TOWN CENTER" ON THE CITY'S ZONING MAP (APN 059-026-030 AND 031)
